title: BIG RED SOUP RECIPE
directions: In a large skillet, brown beef in oil. Transfer to a 5-qt. slow cooker; add the remaining ingredients except for tortillas and cheese. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours or until meat is tender.
To serve, place enough tortilla quarters to cover bottom of each bowl. Pour soup over tortilla pieces; sprinkle with cheese. Yield: 12 servings (3 quarts).
ingredients: 2 pounds beef stew meat, cut into 1-inch cubes
2 cans (14-1/2 ounces each) diced tomatoes in sauce
1 can (10-1/2 ounces) condensed beef broth, undiluted
1 can (10-1/2 ounces) condensed chicken broth, undiluted
1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed tomato soup, undiluted
